subject: Re: Not to be a wet blanket
author: mllejade
full_text:
Hi Bruce,

I've really tried to listen to as many files as I have time for, and 
for the most part, am quite impressed with what people have captured 
from the boxes.  To echo your closing sentiment on flying a little on 
faith that the voices coming through are who they claim to be, I'd 
like to add that one can never be 100% sure and so I simply accept 
them at face value, giving more weight to to the message than the 
messenger.

Sharon

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Ann,
>  
> Thanks for listening that batch of files came from a recent session 
when the signal was not at it's optimum.
> Some times you will receive a less than adequate session due to the 
conditions at the time the session is in progress
> I and a couple of other researchers  are now in the process of 
documenting the exact conditions present during
> a box session and the different affects some conditions have on the 
clarity and strength of the communication.
>  
> As far as the Elvis message goes, we have to remember that spirits 
where also people at one time and that when 
> we go to the first spiritual level after we leave the physical we 
carry with us many of the characteristics we had in our earthly 
personality.
> some spirits are shy some out going some serious some are comedians.
>  
> I believe the Elvis impersonation was not meant maliciously but as 
a joke. Also the way I determine the validity of the communications I 
receive is
> I have gotten to know my techs and have built a relationship with 
them, I recognise the way they speak and they will even go out of 
their way
> to manipulate certain sound fragments so that the voice they create 
is familiar and recognisable to me. I can pretty much rely on what I 
get from them.
> But you can never be 100% sure, you can only use your best 
judgement and gut instinct and fly a little on faith.
>  
> Bruce
> Bruce Halliday 
> 
>

Surely Mike could stop a fake? I'm very curious about what's 
happening over there as we are operating the box, and it is very 
important to me to feel a good amount of certainty that the people 
coming through are who they claim to be. If you can ask, I'd be 
grateful. I don't seem to be able to get those kind of responses yet 
on my own.
